title: Public Access to Resource Hub
description: Verify that public users can access the Resource Hub without authentication, search resources accurately with filters, and view categories and resource items with correct sorting and active status.

steps.description: Navigate to the Resource Hub page as a public user.
Verify the page loads successfully with a list of resource categories.
Apply category filters and text search on resources.
Validate that search results are filtered correctly according to the search string and selected categories.
Click on a resource item.
Confirm that click analytics are recorded and visual indicators update accordingly.

title: Authentication System Login and Role Access
description: Test username-based authentication for ADMIN, HELPER, and GUEST roles, including correct session management, access control enforcement, and login failure handling.

steps.description: Navigate to login page and input valid username and password for ADMIN role.
Submit login form.
Verify login success and access granted to admin console features.
Logout from ADMIN account.
Attempt login with invalid credentials.
Verify login failure message displayed with proper error handling.
Login as HELPER role and verify access to IT Prefect dashboard features.
Confirm HELPER role cannot access admin console.
Login anonymously as GUEST and verify accessible public pages only.
Ensure role-based restrictions prevent access to restricted areas.

title: User Profile Management and Password Change
description: Verify users can view and edit profile information, change their password with validation and server check, and that secure form submissions handle errors correctly.

steps.description: Login as authenticated user.
Navigate to User Profile & Settings page.
Verify current profile information is displayed correctly.
Update profile fields such as display name and preferences.
Submit updates.
Confirm updates persist and changes are visible after reload.
Attempt to change password with invalid current password.
Verify error message for incorrect current password.
Change password with valid current and new password.
Confirm password change success and login with new password works.

title: Club Announcements RSVP and Attendance Tracking
description: Ensure public users can view club announcements, register RSVP, and that RSVP data updates attendance progress bars correctly in UI.

steps.description: Access Club Announcements page as guest user.
Verify all active announcements are displayed with RSVP options.
Register RSVP for an announcement.
Confirm RSVP registration success message.
Return to announcements page and verify attendance progress bar reflects updated RSVP status.
Attempt RSVP registration with invalid data (e.g., missing required fields).
Validate error handling and user feedback for invalid submission.

title: AI Chat Assistant Functionality
description: Verify the AI Chat Assistant floating chatbot is accessible, responds with relevant campus navigation and IT support information, and gracefully handles invalid queries.

steps.description: Load any page and locate the AI Chat Assistant floating button.
Click the chatbot button to open chat interface.
Enter a valid query for campus navigation.
Verify chatbot returns appropriate navigation guidance.
Enter a valid query for IT support.
Confirm relevant IT support information is provided.
Input an unrelated or nonsense query.
Check that chatbot handles it gracefully with fallback message.
Close the chat interface.
Confirm the floating button remains available for reuse.

title: Admin Console User Management Inline Editing and Batch Actions
description: Test that admin users can manage users with inline editing, perform batch operations, and undo/redo actions with data synchronization and error recovery.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN and navigate to User Management page.
Verify list of users is displayed with editable fields inline.
Edit user attributes inline, such as role assignment and status.
Save inline edit changes.
Confirm changes persist and are reflected in database.
Select multiple users and perform a batch action (e.g., role update or deactivate).
Verify batch changes apply correctly for all selected users.
Use undo functionality to revert last changes.
Check data state reverts accurately.
Perform a redo action.
Ensure data state reapplies changes consistently.

title: File Upload System Validation and Secure Storage
description: Verify the file upload system enforces validation rules on file types and sizes, provides appropriate user feedback, stores files securely, and handles errors gracefully.

steps.description: Navigate to a file upload form with an authenticated user.
Attempt to upload a valid file within allowed type and size limits.
Confirm upload success and file is stored in correct secured location.
Attempt to upload a file exceeding size limit.
Verify rejection with appropriate error message.
Attempt to upload a disallowed file type.
Ensure validation prevents upload and displays user-friendly error.
Simulate a network interruption during upload.
Check proper error handling and retry or cancellation options available.

title: Notification System Real-time Alerts and Read Status
description: Verify real-time notifications are received, categorized by priority, displayed appropriately, and that read/unread status updates persist correctly.

steps.description: Login as a user with notifications enabled.
Check that the notification bar displays new incoming notifications immediately.
Verify notifications with different priority levels are visually distinguished.
Mark one or more notifications as read.
Confirm read status is updated in UI and persists on page reload.
Trigger generation of a test notification via API.
Verify the notification is received and displayed in real-time.

title: Dual Calendar System Event Management and Attendee Management
description: Ensure both public and internal calendars display events correctly, support adding, editing, and deleting events, and manage event attendees with synchronization across views.

steps.description: Access public calendar as guest user.
Verify public events are displayed accurately with correct date/time.
Login as IT Prefect and access internal team calendar.
Create new team event with attendees.
Confirm event is visible on internal calendar and attendees are tracked correctly.
Edit existing event details and update attendee list.
Check that changes propagate and attendee statuses update accordingly.
Delete an event and verify it is removed from all calendar views.
Ensure no orphaned attendee records remain after event deletion.

title: Security Measures: CSRF Protection, Rate Limiting, and Session Timeout
description: Test that API endpoints enforce CSRF token validation, that rate limiting prevents abuse, and that sessions expire after configured inactivity to maintain security.

steps.description: Send API requests without CSRF tokens for protected endpoints.
Verify requests are rejected with appropriate CSRF error responses.
Send rapid repeated API requests exceeding rate limit thresholds.
Confirm rate limiting is enforced and further requests are blocked temporarily.
Login successfully and remain idle beyond session timeout duration.
Verify user session expires and subsequent requests require re-authentication.

title: Admin Console Category Management with Icons, Colors, Sorting, and Status
description: Validate that admins can create, edit, and delete resource categories with icon and color selection, control sorting order, and toggle active/inactive status with immediate effect.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN and navigate to category management page.
Verify existing categories are listed with icons and colors visible.
Add a new category selecting an icon and color.
Confirm new category appears in list with selected visuals.
Change sort order of categories and save.
Verify categories display in updated order.
Toggle active status of a category off.
Confirm category no longer appears in public listings.

title: Article CMS Workflow and SEO Feature Validation
description: Test creation, editing, publishing, and archiving of articles with slug generation and SEO metadata support, ensuring workflow states are reflected correctly in UI and URLs.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN and navigate to article management page.
Create a new article with title, content, and SEO metadata fields.
Save the article as draft.
Verify article appears in draft state in article list.
Publish the article.
Confirm article is accessible via generated slug URL with SEO metadata rendered in page headers.
Archive the article.
Check that archived article moves to archive state and is no longer publicly accessible.

title: IT Prefect Dashboard Task and Activity Management
description: Verify the IT Prefect dashboard supports creation, assignment, priority setting, status updates, and tracking of tasks and activities, with accurate reflection on shared calendars and team notes.

steps.description: Login as IT Prefect.
Create a new task with title, description, priority, due date, and assign team members.
Validate that task is listed in task management page with correct details.
Change task status through workflow states (e.g., open, in progress, completed).
Confirm task status updates reflect on dashboard and shared calendar.
Add a team activity linked to a task, set priority and assign users.
Check activity appears with correct metadata and status updates are synchronized.
Modify notes on team information dashboard.
Verify notes save successfully and are shared with team members.

title: System Settings Management and Real-time Updates
description: Test admin ability to modify system settings including general, security, notification, and backup options, ensuring changes are stored in the database and propagate across the portal in real-time.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN and navigate to system settings page.
Verify current settings display correctly grouped by category.
Edit settings such as notification preferences and security parameters.
Save changes.
Confirm changes persist in the database and UI components reflect updates immediately without reload.
Test backup initiation and verify backup completion.
Verify backup status is reported and backup files are created safely.

title: UI Components Accessibility and Responsive Design
description: Verify UI and Theme components render consistently and function correctly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices adhering to accessibility standards including keyboard navigation and ARIA attributes.

steps.description: Load key pages (Resource Hub, Dashboard, Admin Console) on different screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile).
Confirm layout adapts responsively without visual defects.
Use keyboard navigation to access interactive UI components.
Verify focus states are visible and all interactive elements are accessible via keyboard.
Use accessibility tools to inspect ARIA attributes and contrast ratios.
Ensure all components comply with WCAG accessibility guidelines.

title: Database Migration and Data Integrity
description: Test that all database migrations apply cleanly on test environments, preserve existing data integrity, and maintain relationships between entities during updates.

steps.description: Apply latest Prisma migrations on a staging database containing sample production data.
Confirm migration completes without errors.
Validate that user records, resource categories, events, and other entities remain intact and relational integrity is preserved.
Verify foreign keys and data constraints are enforced.
Perform rollback migration.
Ensure rollback restores previous schema state without data loss.
